name: Disk I/O [Deprecated]
description: The diskio sample works with the I/O device using the system file cache and user buffer. Use this sample with the Disk Input and Output analysis of the VTune™ Amplifier to analyze such typical performance issues of the I/O bound application as I/O Waits on a user thread and long I/O queues. Deprecation Notice : This sample will be removed from future releases. It will be available on previous release branches on https://github.com/intel-system-studio/samples.
author: Intel Corporation
